Name: Project Survivor
About the game: Project Survivor Discord Survive Constantly Pouring Monsters for 15 minutes! Unique Gameplay and Gimmicks It is a 2D-Platformer Rogue-lite Survival game. Upgrade and purchase various weapons to hunt more and more monsters. Dodge monsters in an infinite horizontal space, set up a floor and take your place. You can adjust the difficulty of the game by moving it left or right. Various Weapon Upgrades Hunt monsters and earn coins to upgrade your weapons. The more expensive the upgrade, the stronger it will be. Depending on which upgrade you choose, you can play strategically. Various Jobs You can play with 3 classes: Warrior (Melee), Archer (Ranged), Mage (Magic). Even with the same difficulty, depending on the job, even with the same job, depending on the choice of weapons and upgrades You can play differently. Various Weapon Upgrades Hunt monsters and earn coins to upgrade your weapons. The more expensive the upgrade, the stronger it will be. Depending on which upgrade you choose, you can play strategically. Passive Shop For Clearing The Game Coins earned in the game can be used to purchase permanent passives in the shop. If the game is difficult, you can use the passive shop to become stronger. Two Different Modes The platformer mode is a mode made to suit the development intention. You will play as a side-scrolling platformer, and it is a fairly difficult mode. Endless mode increases understanding of the game before going to platformer mode This is a mode where you can earn coins to purchase various passives. Retro Style CRT Filter A CRT filter using a scan line was used to connect to a TV at home to play. It reminds me of nostalgia and enjoyment of the game. Features in Demo Ver. Can Play Range character. Upgrade 3 Weapons & 2 Passives. Defeat 2 Boss Monster Stages. About Project Survivor More Characters! More Weapons & Passives! More Boss Stages.
